features: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted
12-Cup* Coffeemaker - Fast brewing for up to 12 cups* of coffee.
Vortex Technology Showerhead - The exclusive showerhead design evenly saturates coffee grounds, resulting in rich flavor extraction.
Sneak-a-Cup - This feature temporarily stops the flow of coffee so you can pour your first cup before brewing ends without making a mess.
Digital Controls - QuickTouch programming lets you set the digital clock and program the 24-hour auto brew feature so you can brew coffee now or later.
body.description: Enjoy rich flavor extraction with the BLACK+DECKER™ 12-Cup* Programmable Coffeemaker. The Vortex Technology Showerhead evenly saturates coffee grounds using optimal water flow for maximum flavor. You can change the brew strength with the option for a slower brewing process and stronger cup of coffee. Sneak-A-Cup™ Technology lets you pour a cup of coffee before the rest of the pot has brewed—all without any drips or spills. The digital controls feature QuickTouch™ Programming so you can easily set the clock and program the auto brew system for coffee now or later at the touch of a button.*cup equals approximately 5 oz. (varies by brewing technique)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Over the past few years, I have tried several coffee maker machines. The issue I had was the coffee was not hot. The last one was a named brand and expensive maker. The coffee came out at about 150 degrees which is not that great. This unit makes darn good coffee and it is HOT and stays hot for all twelve cups. Very simple machine, with no frills or difficult programming, just off and on. You have only a couple of choices, time delay and coffee strength, that's it, which is all one really needs. As far as quality, this unit is not built that great, a bit flimsy BUT it works well and makes good coffee. And, for the price, who can complain?Update; It is advertised as a 12 cup but it is not. I measured and the pot only holds about 10 cups. Not big deal but it is not 12 cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great coffemaker for the money
reviews.reviewText: My old coffee maker died after about 30 years. I researched Mr Coffee and the reviews said quality had gone downhill. So I looked at this Black and Decker unit instead.I have used this at least 50 times since I bought it so I would say that I am pretty familiar with it. Here’s my review:- it’s fine- it brews coffee quickly- it has an automatic timer and turns off if you forget and leave it on the burner- it is kind of loud, but that’s OK- when you first start using it, the basket is a bit quirky, and a couple of times I did it wrong where the coffee didn’t drain properly and I got grounds in the drink. But after a while you learn to just double check it after you put the filter paper and coffee in and you can kind of feel a “click” when you align it properly and shut the top. But it is possible to put the basket in the wrong way I know it because I did it a couple times- it has the “sneak a cup” function, meaning you can get a cup while it is still brewing. That’s cool, I use it a lot. However, a minor problem is that one drop always spills when you do it (not a lot, just one drop) because when you take the carafe off from under the basket and the connection is lost it just always drops one drop that sizzles on the burner. Not a giant deal, just a minor thing that bugs me every day a little bitSo it is definitely worth the money, and works fine. Coffee tastes good, it is fast, and it has automatic shut off. Works great for me. And it is very cheap for what it does. If it dies in a couple years (which I expect), I will just go on the forums again and find another one that is best rated at the time (and cheap) or just re buy this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Coffee Maker at Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Simple to use, great quality coffee making. It was easy to set up and program. I'm very happy with it overall, my only complaint is that it doesn't keep the coffee hot for very long at all, which is a disappointment. The strong brew function works very well, and I'm happy with my selection. We needed a new coffee maker and this was economical and a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Regular shaped filters is a plus for me, has worked very well so far, makes coffee quickly. One disappointment lid/top doesn't always shut correctly seems a little off. Nice bright lights on clock, auto shut off, has a strong brew option. Let's you know when it needs to be cleaned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very satisfied with flavor, ease of use & preset timer that works well!
reviews.reviewText: We've used Mr Coffee pots for years & some off brands. They just don't last long anymore. And they're either plain Jane or too many bells & whistles. This is a simple coffee maker with an optional pre set timer if you like. It is reasonably priced & so far it is making us fine cups of coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker at a good price
reviews.reviewText: The one thing I like most is the dripless spout of the carafe. Seems like a simple idea, but really is nice. It could be a bit warmer. A real value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace a version of this coffee maker that was either 20 or 25 years old. I've owned two of the older model and don't know which one I was still using. I wore the plastic cover off the 'Brew' button on it years ago...You couldn't pour coffee out of the old pot (carafe?) without it siphoning up the side of the pot and splattering coffee around the target when it was full. My daughter who has small hands had trouble handling the pot when it was full.Wow! It's amazing when new and improved really is. The pot included with this model looks almost the same but isn't. The handle has been redesigned and my daughter has no problem with it when the pot is full. That surprised me because the handle is actually bigger. The pot itself has been redesigned and coffee can be poured fast without siphoning up the outside of the pot even when it's full. No more coffee splattered around the cup.I like strong black coffee so the 'Strong' option is really nice and produces great coffee. The 'Clean' indicator is a nice feature which reminds me to clean the pot after every 60 brews. It cleans the pot plumbing but misses the outside of the vortex spout (sprinkler?). I now scrub the spout with a brush dipped in vinegar before starting the self cleaning process.I love this coffee maker. I really love the 'Strong' option and not having to be really careful when pouring out of a full pot. Kudos to B&D for the great product improvements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product!

reviews.reviewText: Love the product.. easy to use / clean / the flavor it brings...down side for my opinion,,I had to buy a reusable filter basket you can order separate from Amazon.ca ...( i prefer not the paper basket)...I truly trust Black & Decker products..so far so good
Nice Replacement Coffee Machine for our old one. Cost-effective and works as desired
Great little pot, no spills on pourEasy to use

reviews.reviewTitle: Low cost,but makes the job of more expensie of the same
reviews.reviewText: It is low cost, but same quality of more expensive coffee pot. So overall very satisfied.
